content.text: The Integrated Mitotic Stem Cell is a data driven model and visualization tool that captures a holistic view of human cell division for the first time.

This model transforms microscopy images of 15 individual organelles into an integrated representation of the undifferentiated human induced pluripotent stem cell (hIPSC) at each major stage of mitosis.
